snippet: An indictment describes a criminal ring whose members drugged wealthy men and took them to establishments where thousands of dollars were charged to their credit cards.
abstract: Indictment in State Supreme Court in Manhattan describes criminal ring whose members drugged well-off men, took them to strip clubs, running up tens of thousands of dollars on their credit cards while they were incapacitated; five people are accused of stealing at least $200,000 from victims.
lead_paragraph: An indictment describes a criminal ring whose members drugged wealthy men and took them to establishments where thousands of dollars were charged to their credit cards.

headline.main: 5 Accused of Luring Men to Strip Clubs for a Night They Wouldn’t Remember
headline.print_headline: 5 Accused of Plot to Lure Men to Strip Clubs for a Night They Wouldn’t Remember
